caption.p: Simulation of virus co-infection. (A) 6 cases of double virus infection that was verified using 10 3 and 10 2 copies/μl respectively. (B) 4 cases of three virus infections verified using 10 3 and 10 2 copies/μL. The color was the same as Fig. 1. (For interpretation of the references to color in this figure legend, the reader is referred to the Web version of this article.)
